Plot: a name, a face, a word or a woman that suddenly and repeatedly emerges in 17-year-old Aida's mind. She tries to get rid of it, but it pops up again and tortures her. The image is that of a ...
Title: Aida, I Saw Your Father Last Night
Writer: Kambuzia Partovi, Rasoul Sadrameli, Marjan Shirmohammadi
Actors: Khatereh Asadi, Ehteram Boroumand, Sharareh Dolat Abadi, Shahrokh Foroutanian
